nodes.text: Aspyr Media (pronounced "Aspire") has released ports of a number of Star Wars video games to devices released by Apple Inc. Aspyr is a company that trades in doing this with a number of games. Their library of Star Wars ports to Apple's Macintosh systems includes LEGO Star Wars: The Video Game, Star Wars: The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition, Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, Star Wars: Battlefront, Star Wars: Empire at War, Star Wars: Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast, and Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy. They have released other ports of Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, for the iPad on May 30, 2013 and for Android on April 29, 2015.
